The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

priority2meme

Usage:

priority2meme [options] <matrix file>

Description

Convert an PRIORITY matrix file into a MEME motif file suitable for use with MEME Suite programs.

Input

<matrix file>

The name of a PRIORITY file, which describes a motif in terms of a position weight matrix.

Output

Options

Option Parameter Description Default Behavior
General Options
